page.title: 04The Chalfont St Peter River.
page.content: {Landscape} The banks of the river are mainly covered with weeds and small shrubs.As it flows through the busy centre of Chalfont St Peter,it has to go underground frequently.We counted five bridges in our area. {Wildlife} The only life to be found in this part of the river is weeds, water insects and water boatmen.In Spring frogspawn and tadpoles can be found.Watersnails help to purify the water by eating the slime on the banks. {Industry} In our area along the river re are only one or two factories which include the car manufacturing company, Airpell. {Route} As the Misbourne flows through our area it roughly follows the A413. Where the river is wide,it is only a few inches deep but it is about a foot deep in the narrower areas.
